amendment.description: Amendment provides that people forced to purchase flood insurance as a result of a new map who live in an area where the levees were previously certified, and have now been decertified, will receive a grace period of 5 years in which they will be entitled to a 50 percent reduction in their flood insurance premium.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 110-351 to say that people forced to purchase flood insurance as a result of the new map who have lived in an area where the levees were previously certified, and have now been decertified, will receive a grace period of 5 years in which they will be entitled to a 50% reduction in their flood insurance premium while the levees are being recertified.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
